name: Ace Pilot
description: Skilled at operating starships and other vehicles, Ace Pilots are known for their steady hands and nerves of steel.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Relentless trackers, Bounty Hunters excel at finding and capturing their targets, dead or alive.

name: Icon
description: Famous individuals, Icons leverage their celebrity status to influence others and gain access.

name: Mercenary
description: Hired guns, Mercenaries are seasoned warriors who fight for profit and survival.

name: Outlaw
description: Living on the fringes of society, Outlaws use their cunning and agility to stay one step ahead.

name: Priest
description: Devout followers, Priests draw strength from their faith to guide and protect others.

name: Scholar
description: Knowledge seekers, Scholars dedicate their lives to learning and understanding the universe.

name: Spacefarer
description: Explorers of the cosmos, Spacefarers are at home among the stars and unknown worlds.

name: Xenoseeker
description: Fascinated by alien cultures, Xenoseekers strive to make contact and understand new species.

name: Themeless
description: Without a specific theme, Themeless characters rely on versatility and adaptability.
